orientacio.text1: Come to see if you are capable to find all the spots of our orientation circuit.
orientacio.text2: The spots are all along the zone around our ubication.
orientacio.maxim: * The groups must be at least 4 people and maximum of 10. For mor people contact us.
orientacio.agilitzar: In order to speed up the process, you can download and bring filled in the following documents:
orientacio.autoritzacio: Parental consent in the case of a minor.
